summary: Bug fix verification for NodeToolbar, MultiSelectToolbar, and ContextMenu touch support. Desktop tests PASSED: All toolbar buttons (duplicate, style, edit, mark as completed) work correctly with onPointerUp handlers. Mobile tests PARTIAL: '+' button works, but unable to fully test NodeToolbar because nodes are positioned outside viewport after being added.

issues: Nodes added via '+' button are positioned outside the visible viewport, making it difficult to interact with them

critical_code_review_comments: ✅ NodeToolbar.jsx: ToolbarButton uses onPointerUp with e.preventDefault() and e.stopPropagation() - CORRECT
✅ NodeToolbar.jsx: Buttons have min-w-[44px] min-h-[44px] for proper touch hit area - CORRECT
✅ NodeToolbar.jsx: Has touch-manipulation, z-[60], touchAction: none - CORRECT
✅ MultiSelectToolbar.jsx: ToolbarBtn uses onPointerUp with same pattern - CORRECT
✅ MultiSelectToolbar.jsx: Buttons have min-w-[40px] min-h-[40px] - CORRECT (slightly smaller but acceptable)
✅ ContextMenu.jsx: MenuButton uses onPointerUp with same pattern - CORRECT
✅ ContextMenu.jsx: Has min-h-[44px], z-index: 100, touchAction: none - CORRECT
